name: Jewelry Bonney
text: On Play: If your Leader has the {Supernovas} type and your life total is equal to or less than your opponent's, place up to one of your opponent's cost 4 or lower characters on the top or bottom of their life face-up.

effect.text: If your Leader has the {Supernovas} type and your life total is equal to or less than your opponent's, place up to one of your opponent's cost 4 or lower characters on the top or bottom of their life face-up.

meta.notes: Card is a sample image with 'SAMPLE' watermark. Rarity is 'SP' as printed. Power and life are not printed on the card.
